lines.text: Things haven't changed since Adam, and he gave up one of his ribs so he'd have somebody to keep things from.
Just because you can't see the air doesn't keep you from breathing. And just because you can't see God doesn't keep you from believing.
Your mother would always tell me, "Girl, you need to get some meat on those bones. Henry ain't got nothing to grab on to back there!"
She just wanted you to eat, that's all.
No, she probably wanted me to be as fat as her.
Please, if a policeman saw your mama come walking down the street, he'd yell, "break it up!"

[after seeing one of Hamilton's commercials on television]
That man is so oily, you could fry chicken on his smile.
You have no idea what the competition is like just to be sent down here.
It's okay if I look in the window, just as long as I don't buy.
Yeah? Well, don't go shopping with money in your pocket! And you better not be putting anything in the layaway plan, either!
Who would use Baby Wet Wet for Jesus?
